text: Tad, The Lost Explorer (Spanish: Las aventuras de Tadeo Jones) is a 2012 Spanish 3D computer-animated adventure movie directed by Enrique Gato. It was produced by Telecinco Cinema and Lightbox Entertainment. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2012 animated movies Category:2012 adventure movies Category:Spanish movies Category:Spanish-language movies
title: Tad, The Lost Explorer
